name: Renault Clio 1.5 DCi 85 Privilege 2005 Manual 5 doors specs
description:
Renault Clio 1.5 DCi 85 Privilege is a 2005 Hatchback model with 5 speed manual transmission.
    
With a power of 63 KW you can reach  0-100km h in just 12,7 seconds and a maximum speed of 174 km/h with an urban consumption of 5,2 l/100km.
The engine has a capacity of 1461 cc with 4, in line cylinders and 2 valves per cylinders.

Also this model has a weight of  with coil springs front suspension and a coil springs rear suspension.

options.title: COSTS PER MONTH (4 YEARS / 15,000 KM P.J.)
